SEARCH
Package controller.AppointmentControllers

Class PatientAppointmentControllerImpl

java.lang.Object
controller.AppointmentControllers.PatientAppointmentControllerImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
AppointmentController, PatientAppointmentController
public class PatientAppointmentControllerImpl extends Object implements PatientAppointmentController
The PatientAppointmentControllerImpl class provides concrete implementations of methods for patients to manage their appointments. It interacts with the AppointmentManager to perform operations such as scheduling appointments, canceling them, and checking available slots. This class follows the Singleton design pattern, ensuring only one instance exists.

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      patientId - the unique identifier of the patient.
      doctorId - the unique identifier of the doctor.
      dateTime - the date and time of the appointment.
      type - the type of appointment (e.g., consultation, follow-up).
      Returns:
